fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Monthly Course Completion Rates
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to calculate percentage metrics over time and visualize completion rate trends.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Show me monthly course completion rates for the past year in a line chart. When I click on a month, show me which courses had enrollments and their completion details.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a line chart showing completion rates by month
Completion rate is calculated as percentage (completed/enrolled)
Chart shows trend in completion rates over time
Chart supports drill-down to show courses with completion stats for selected month
Course table allows opening individual course records
